title: CDO Portfolio Administrator
description: Administered clients' CDO Portfolios which inlcuded broadly-syndicated loans, middle-market loans, equity, bonds, mortgage-backed assets, etc. Provided daily cash reports for clients and processed wires for loan trades. Reconciled portfolios for monthly reporting and delivered payments for investor liabilities during quarterly NVR as well as invoices for third-party vendors.

title: Research Assistant
company: Becker Friedman Institute for Research in Economics
description: Assisted the Department of Economics for research in student effort. Directly participated in Field Experiments, using control and experiment groups to conduct experiments in Chicago suburbs. Performed data entry from the results of student testing, comparing the effects of different methods used to solve questions.

title: Technical Support Assistant
description: Performed aid with software/hardware computer technology at a public school. Managed computer software, monitored school databases, and fixed hardware issues. Helped teachers understand technology to assist with student eduction.
